list.name: Changes
list.comment: System ids are now generated at runtime. You can now have as many instances of a system as you like.

task.summary: System / Component creation/deletion is now deferred.
can now assign values to components after creating them. currently relies on allocating a temp component in an arena before copying to comp data. not the most elegant solution
system updates are now passed a list of entities they are operating on.
ported existing test code to ecs.
refactor rendercommands and fix crash on shutdown
Engine now compiles for linux in gcc and clang (tested on Ubuntu 24.04)
fix crash when closing window on linux.
fix crash when closing window on linux.
Additional AST Nodes. AST nodes can now dump debug text to aid debugging.
Shader compiler updates - handles binary ops much better - uniform locations are now determined by looking at the vertex buffer
textures can now be auto serialised by the reflection system.
Shaders now own their own resources
reflection now supports polymorphic serialisation via shared_ptr
Shaders are now imported the same way as other assets.
Added a basic asset manager that will allow reusing assets that are already loaded.
Shaders now have "settings" these behave similarly to uniforms except they are compile time constants. settings must be set before a shader generates its platform resources.
settings can now be used to define array sizes. added support to shader parser for array declarations and array access.
ssl now supports for loops + input and output ports can now be arrays
shaders now need to specify a type. port naming rules have been relaxed
fixed issue with uniform values being applied before the gl program was created.
moved a bunch of gumph in test app into the engine where it should have been all along
removed unused component types form test system
system update order and grouping is now calculated automatically.
System ids are now generated at runtime. You can now have as many instances of a system as you like.

MESSAGE.value: bump engine.
fix crash when closing window on linux.
Cleanup vertex buffer creation
Additional AST Nodes. AST nodes can now dump debug text to aid debugging.
Shader compiler updates - handles binary ops much better - uniform locations are now determined by looking at the vertex buffer
Shader refactor
textures can now be auto serialised by the reflection system.
model can now serialise automatically
Shaders now own their own resources
reflection now supports polymorphic serialisation via shared_ptr
Shaders are now imported the same way as other assets.
Moved shader to asset namespace
Added a basic asset manager that will allow reusing assets that are already loaded.
Shaders now have "settings" these behave similarly to uniforms except they are compile time constants. settings must be set before a shader generates its platform resources.
settings can now be used to define array sizes. added support to shader parser for array declarations and array access.
ssl now supports for loops + input and output ports can now be arrays
slight point light optimisation
shaders now need to specify a type. port naming rules have been relaxed
fixed issue with uniform values being applied before the gl program was created.
moved a bunch of gumph in test app into the engine where it should have been all along
removed unused component types form test system
Add support for relationships.
system update order and grouping is now calculated automatically.
bump engine
System ids are now generated at runtime. You can now have as many instances of a system as you like.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: System ids are now generated at runtime. You can now have as many instances of a system as you like.
